description:
You have the ability to control the ages of mobs such as bees and sheep. Pressing secondary key (which you can reassign to right click) activates one of three powers depending on which hand you hold your Clock in:

Age-Up: Holding your clock in your Main Hand will cause a targeted entity to instantaneously become an adult version of themself.

Age-Down: Holding your clock in your Offhand will cause a targeted entity to instantly become a baby version of themself.

Permanent Age-Down: Holding a clock in both your Offhand and Main Hand will cause the targeted entity to instantly revert into a baby version of themself and stay that way permanently.
name: Age Control

actions.command: execute as @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=0.0..2,type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:area_effect_cloud,type=!minecraft:item,nbt=!{Age:0}] run data merge entity @s {Age:0}
execute as @e[limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=0.0..2,type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:area_effect_cloud,type=!minecraft:item,nbt=!{Age:0b}] run data merge entity @s {IsBaby:0b}
